seasons:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS seasons (
            season INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY
leagues:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS leagues (
            lg_id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
            lg_name TEXT,
            type TEXT,
            comp_tier TEXT,
            big_five INTEGER,
            api_id INTEGER,
            country_code TEXT,
            logo_url TEXT
ls:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ls (
    ls_id TEXT NOT NULL,
    lg_id INTEGER,
    season INTEGER,
    season_long TEXT,
    lg_name TEXT,
    has_adv_stats TEXT,
    ls_api TEXT,
    has_rounds REAL,
    lg_start DATE,
    lg_end DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (ls_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (lg_id) REFERENCES leagues(lg_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (season) REFERENCES seasons(season)
teams:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS teams (
    tid VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL,
    team_name VARCHAR(40),
    api_id INTEGER,
    code VARCHAR(3),
    country VARCHAR(30),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    venue VARCHAR(70),
    capacity INTEGER,
    logo_url VARCHAR(60),
    venue_url VARCHAR(60),
    lat REAL,
    lon REAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (tid)
tls:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tls (
    tls_id VARCHAR(17) NOT NULL,
    tid VARCHAR(8),
    lg_id INTEGER,
    season INTEGER,
    season_long VARCHAR(12),
    ls_id VARCHAR(15),
    has_adv_stats VARCHAR(10),
    PRIMARY KEY (tls_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tid) REFERENCES teams(tid),
    FOREIGN KEY (lg_id) REFERENCES leagues(lg_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (season) REFERENCES seasons(season),
    FOREIGN KEY (ls_id) REFERENCES league_seasons(ls_id)
matches:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS matches (
    match_id VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL,
    date DATE,
    home_team_id VARCHAR(8),
    away_team_id VARCHAR(8),
    ls_id VARCHAR(15),
    PRIMARY KEY (match_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (ls_id) REFERENCES league_seasons(ls_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (home_team_id) REFERENCES teams(tid),
    FOREIGN KEY (away_team_id) REFERENCES teams(tid)
players:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS players (
    pid VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    api_id VARCHAR(8),
    dob DATE,
    birth_city VARCHAR(50),
    birth_country VARCHAR(40),
    nationality VARCHAR(40),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT,
    photo VARCHAR(70),
    PRIMARY KEY (pid)
ptls:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ptls (
    ptls_id VARCHAR(28) NOT NULL,
    tls_id VARCHAR(17),
    pid VARCHAR(8),
    PRIMARY KEY (ptls_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tls_id) REFERENCES team_league_seasons(tls_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (pid) REFERENCES players(pid)
team_matches:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS team_matches (
    team_match VARCHAR(17) NOT NULL,
    match_id VARCHAR(8),
    tls_id VARCHAR(17),
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    round VARCHAR(50),
    tid VARCHAR(8),
    opp_tid VARCHAR(8),
    home_away VARCHAR(1),
    result VARCHAR(3),
    gf INT,
    ga INT,
    so_gf INT,
    so_ga INT,
    xg REAL,
    xga REAL,
    poss REAL,
    formation VARCHAR(12),
    sh INT,
    sot INT,
    sh_dist REAL,
    sh_fk INT,
    pk_made INT,
    pk_att INT,
    npxg REAL,
    pass_cmp_t INT,
    pass_att_t INT,
    pass_cmp_pct_t REAL,
    pass_totdist REAL,
    pass_prgdist REAL,
    pass_cmp_s INT,
    pass_att_s INT,
    pass_cmp_pct_s REAL,
    pass_cmp_m INT,
    pass_att_m INT,
    pass_cmp_pct_m REAL,
    pass_cmp_l INT,
    pass_att_l INT,
    pass_cmp_pct_l REAL,
    ast INT,
    xag REAL,
    xa REAL,
    key_passes INT,
    pass_fthird INT,
    pass_pena INT,
    cross_pena INT,
    pass_prg INT,
    pass_live INT,
    pass_dead INT,
    pass_fk INT,
    through_balls INT,
    switches INT,
    crosses INT,
    throw_ins INT,
    corners INT,
    pass_block INT,
    sca INT,
    sc_passlive INT,
    sc_passdead INT,
    sc_takeon INT,
    sc_shot INT,
    sc_fld INT,
    sc_def INT,
    gca INT,
    gc_passlive INT,
    gc_passdead INT,
    gc_takeon INT,
    gc_shot INT,
    gc_fld INT,
    gc_def INT,
    touches INT,
    tch_defpen INT,
    tch_def3 INT,
    tch_mid3 INT,
    tch_att3 INT,
    tch_attpen INT,
    tch_live INT,
    to_att INT,
    to_suc INT,
    to_suc_pct REAL,
    to_tk INT,
    to_tk_pct REAL,
    carries INT,
    car_dist INT,
    car_prgdist INT,
    car_prg INT,
    car_f3 INT,
    car_pen INT,
    car_mis_cont INT,
    car_dis_poss INT,
    pass_rec INT,
    pass_prg_rec INT,
    tkl INT,
    tkl_won INT,
    tkl_def3 INT,
    tkl_mid3 INT,
    tkl_att3 INT,
    tkl_drb INT,
    tkl_drb_att INT,
    tkl_drb_pct REAL,
    tkl_drb_lost INT,
    blocks INT,
    block_sh INT,
    block_pass INT,
    int INT,
    tkl_plus_int INT,
    clearances INT,
    err_oppsh INT,
    crd_y INT,
    crd_r INT,
    crd_2y INT,
    fls INT,
    fld INT,
    offside INT,
    og INT,
    recov INT,
    aer_won INT,
    aer_lost INT,
    aer_pct REAL,
    sot_ag INT,
    saves INT,
    save_pct REAL,
    clean_sheet INT,
    ps_xg REAL,
    pk_att_ag INT,
    pk_saved INT,
    pk_miss_ag INT,
    pass_launch_cmp INT,
    pass_launch_att INT,
    pass_launch_cmp_pct REAL,
    keep_pass_att INT,
    keep_throw_att INT,
    keep_launch_pct REAL,
    keep_pass_avg_len REAL,
    glkck_att INT,
    glkck_launch_pct REAL,
    glkck_avg_len REAL,
    crosses_ag INT,
    crosses_ag_stp INT,
    crosses_ag_stp_pct REAL,
    def_out_pena INT,
    def_out_pena_avg_dist REAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (team_match),
    FOREIGN KEY (match_id) REFERENCES matches(match_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tls_id) REFERENCES team_league_seasons(tls_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tid) REFERENCES teams(tid)
player_matches:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS player_matches (
    player_match VARCHAR(17) NOT NULL,
    pid VARCHAR(8),
    match_id VARCHAR(8),
    tls_id VARCHAR(17),
    team_match VARCHAR(17),
    season_long VARCHAR(12),
    date DATE,
    start VARCHAR(1),
    position VARCHAR(3),
    min INT,
    gls INT,
    ast INT,
    pk_made INT,
    pk_att INT,
    sh INT,
    sot INT,
    xg REAL,
    npxg REAL,
    xag REAL,
    sca INT,
    gca INT,
    pass_cmp_t INT,
    pass_att_t INT,
    pass_cmp_pct_t REAL,
    pass_totdist REAL,
    pass_prgdist REAL,
    pass_cmp_s INT,
    pass_att_s INT,
    pass_cmp_pct_s REAL,
    pass_cmp_m INT,
    pass_att_m INT,
    pass_cmp_pct_m REAL,
    pass_cmp_l INT,
    pass_att_l INT,
    pass_cmp_pct_l REAL,
    xa REAL,
    key_passes INT,
    pass_fthird INT,
    pass_pena INT,
    cross_pena INT,
    pass_prg INT,
    pass_live INT,
    pass_dead INT,
    pass_fk INT,
    through_balls INT,
    switches INT,
    crosses INT,
    throw_ins INT,
    corners INT,
    pass_block INT,
    tkl INT,
    tkl_won INT,
    tkl_def3 INT,
    tkl_mid3 INT,
    tkl_att3 INT,
    tkl_drb INT,
    tkl_drb_att INT,
    tkl_drb_pct REAL,
    tkl_drb_lost INT,
    blocks INT,
    block_sh INT,
    block_pass INT,
    int INT,
    tkl_plus_int INT,
    clearances INT,
    err_oppsh INT,
    touches INT,
    tch_defpen INT,
    tch_def3 INT,
    tch_mid3 INT,
    tch_att3 INT,
    tch_attpen INT,
    tch_live INT,
    to_att INT,
    to_suc INT,
    to_suc_pct REAL,
    to_tk INT,
    to_tk_pct REAL,
    carries INT,
    car_dist INT,
    car_prgdist INT,
    car_prg INT,
    car_f3 INT,
    car_pen INT,
    car_mis_cont INT,
    car_dis_poss INT,
    pass_rec INT,
    pass_prg_rec INT,
    crd_y INT,
    crd_r INT,
    crd_2y INT,
    fls INT,
    fld INT,
    offside INT,
    pk_won REAL,
    og INT,
    recov INT,
    aer_won INT,
    aer_lost INT,
    aer_pct REAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_match),
    FOREIGN KEY (pid) REFERENCES players(pid),
    FOREIGN KEY (match_id) REFERENCES matches(match_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tls_id) REFERENCES team_league_seasons(tls_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (team_match) REFERENCES team_matches(team_match)
keeper_matches:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS keeper_matches (
    keeper_match VARCHAR(19) NOT NULL,
    player_match VARCHAR(17),
    pid VARCHAR(8),
    match_id VARCHAR(8),
    tls_id VARCHAR(17),
    team_match VARCHAR(17),
    season_long VARCHAR(12),
    date DATE,
    start VARCHAR(1),
    position VARCHAR(3),
    min INT,
    sot_against INT,
    goals_against INT,
    saves INT,
    save_pct REAL,
    clean_sheets INT,
    post_sh_xg REAL,
    pk_att_against INT,
    pk_allowed INT,
    pk_saved INT,
    pk_missed INT,
    launched_cmp INT,
    launched_att INT,
    launched_cmp_pct REAL,
    pass_att INT,
    throws_att INT,
    pass_launched_pct REAL,
    pass_avg_len REAL,
    gk_att INT,
    gk_launch_pct REAL,
    gk_avg_len REAL,
    crosses_faced INT,
    crosses_stopped INT,
    cross_stop_pct REAL,
    def_act_outside_pen INT,
    daop_avg_dist REAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (keeper_match),
    FOREIGN KEY (pid) REFERENCES players(pid),
    FOREIGN KEY (match_id) REFERENCES matches(match_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tls_id) REFERENCES team_league_seasons(tls_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (team_match) REFERENCES team_matches(team_match)
team_values:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS team_values (
    tv_id VARCHAR(14) NOT NULL,
    tid_tm INT,
    tid VARCHAR(8),
    team_name VARCHAR(40),
    squad_size INT,
    avg_value INT,
    total_value INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (tv_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tid) REFERENCES teams(tid)
player_values:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS player_values (
    pv_id VARCHAR(14) NOT NULL,
    pid VARCHAR(8),
    tid VARCHAR(8),
    lg_id INT,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    valuation INT,
    age INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (pv_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (pid) REFERENCES players(pid),
    FOREIGN KEY (tid) REFERENCES teams(tid),
    FOREIGN KEY (lg_id) REFERENCES leagues(lg_id)
